level.text: Each child-placing agency which accepts students as interns for field placements shall:
Develop a written plan describing their tasks and functions;
Provide a copy of the plan to each student and his or her school;
Require personal references and a criminal records and child abuse clearance;
Designate a staff member to supervise and evaluate the students; and
Develop a plan for orientation and training of students in the philosophy of the agency, needs of the children in care, and of their families.
A student shall not assume the responsibilities of any paid staff member.
